column2: FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are:
– using the correct and complete set of drawings
– all drawings are the latest revision
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Drawings and drawing registers
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
1.2 Implementation of all measures and controls
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS & WP
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS, WP
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Set out work in accordance with drawings and in accordance with alignments, levels, grades, and sections
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: AFILs shall be installed in coundit underneath concrete & above any reinforcing. The hearing loops shall be installed within a 25 or 32mm conduit with dimensions 4m x 8m to suit drawing setout.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Hearing loop cable shall be 1C 6mm2 cable & feeder cable star quad 4C 4/6mm2 (twisted pair speaker cable). Hearing loop cable shall be placed in conduit underneath footpath concrete.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Hearing loop 1C 6mm2 cable shall be jointed to 4C feeder cable injunction box located in detector loop pit adjacent to each hearing loop.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
FREQUENCY: Prior to commissioning for feeder cables
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The 4C feeder cable shall be connected to amplifiers in station OCS room ready for commissioning.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Public Address loop signage shall be installed in compliance with the drawings.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Each hearing loop shall be commissioined by an experienced sound technician / professional in accorance with relevant Australian Standards and IEC standards.
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: AS1428, AS60118.4, IEC 60118.4, NIST-013 6.1.3.1.3
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Commissioning Checklist & Commissioning Certification
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Red-line markup cable route and installation to suit actual conditions.
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: IFC Drawings, Redline Markup
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
